name: Five Nights at F***boy's: Complete Collection
name_original: Five Nights at F***boy's: Complete Collection
description:
Five Nights at F---boy’s is a FNaF fangame series in RPG Maker VX Ace featuring f---ing unfair difficulty, text-to-speech voice acting, and beautiful, beautiful animatronic yiffing. Here, these games are remade in the Complete Collection edition, upgraded in RPG Maker MV.

In Five Nights at F---boy's 1, you control Freddy, who decided he wants to have a RADICAL NIGHT OF HARDCORE DEBAUCHERY, and the surveillance cameras of the pizzeria are the only thing standing in his way. With the help of Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, Freddy must destroy the cameras so he can have the time of his life.

In Five Nights at F---boy's 2, Toy Freddy wants to partake in a MIND-CRUSHINGLY AMAZING NIGHT OF PURE EXCITEMENT AND REVELRY but cannot do so until all of the security cameras around the pizzeria have been f---ed up. Thus begins his journey to s--- on them…

In Five Nights at F---boy's 3, Springtrap wants to commence the ULTIMATE NIGHT OF DEBAUCHERY but his passage to the office is blocked, so he must s--- on the phantoms; the guardians of the office. However, his true motives lay unclear...
